Class ExpiringCacher<K,C,V>

  • java.lang.Object

  • Type Parameters:
    K -

    public class ExpiringCacher<K,C,V>
extends java.lang.Object
    a cache which invalidates every time a timeout happens OR one of the resetting queries happens
